Trust BrowserAuditVault

⬡ Skill Trust Browser

Before installing a skill, verify its trust score. Auditors submit anonymous ZK attestations — their identities are never recorded on-chain. Only the aggregate trust signal is public.

or drop / click to upload a skill file — hash computed locally, nothing sent to any server

Example skills (demo data):

How it works

⬡

Anonymous attestation

Auditors examine skill files and submit ZK attestations. Their identities never appear in public state — only the trust score increments.

⬡

Content-addressed

Trust scores are keyed to the SHA256 of skill file content. If the file changes, the hash changes — prior attestations no longer apply.

⬡

Private credential vault

Store API keys and secrets as private notes on Aztec. Grant scoped access to individual skills via AuthWit — never expose your full vault.

The Isnad Chain — private by default. verifiable by proof. owned by no one.0.1.0-devnet · Aztec devnet
